chapters.title: Chapter 49: Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Mora, p. 724—Wise One of the Goshien Aiel during Aviendha's fourth step through the columns of Rhuidean her second trip through. She cannot channel. She and Ladalin are the only remaining Wise Ones from the Council of 22; only the two of them and three clan chiefs are left. She has a soft, matronly voice. See also Ladalin; Takai; Tamaar.
